duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, execute, analyze, and document bench-scale experimental processes to achieve research program goals.
Provide accurate and reliable sample test data to support internal and external customers utilizing specialized instrumentation and associated techniques.
Construct, operate, troubleshoot, and maintain lab-scale reaction equipment and perform necessary analytical functions to analyze, report, and document experimental results.
Perform sample analysis, technical writing, and execution of analytical methods using specialized laboratory instruments.
Follow safe work practices for handling chemicals, and work in a collaborative team environment to develop analytical methods.
Communicate the value created from experimental results.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in chemistry or a related discipline (Master’s preferred)
2 years of relevant experience working in a research or analytical lab
